name: Ghost Wrangler
description:
Description:

A western themed first person shooter for the "My First Game Jam: Summer 2020" Game Jam.

Controls:

W/A/S/D = Forward/Left/Backward/Right movement keys
Space = Jump
Left Mouse = Shoot

Foreword:

This was our first game jam and our first time ever making a game in Unity! It took us about two week's of development. We hope you have at least 10 seconds of fun. ;)

Purestruggle = Code
Laughinwhale = Art
